metadata.title: CVE-2022-41977 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An out of bounds read vulnerability exists in the way OpenImageIO versionv2.3.19.0 processes string fields in TIFF image files. A specially-craftedTIFF file can lead to information disclosure. An attacker can provide amalicious file to trigger this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: openimageio: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
